text: aur jin logon nen kuphr ekhtiyaar kiya tha apane (vakt qe) paigambaron se kahane lage ham to tumako apanee sarazameen se zarur nikaal baahar kar degen yahaan tak ki tum phir hamaare mazahab kee taraph palat aao-to unake paravaradigaar ne unakee taraph vahee bhejee ki tum ghabaraon nahin ham un sarakash logon ko zarur barbaad karegen
